snippet.title: Live Penalty game (August 2020)
snippet.description:
Download and play against real goalkeepers in our LIVE PENALTY game!

iPhone: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/live-penalty/id1486572049
Android : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.livepenalty.android

https://www.livepenalty.com

Play against real goalkeepers, shoot real footballs, experience real stadiums — all within your phone.

Live Penalty is a F2P multiplayer mobile game that combines the real and the digital world of sports. Via live video stream, an unlimited number of online gamers (digital) can control a physical machine and compete against live athletes (real).

The goal of the game is to proceed to the final round and earn as many goals, LivePoints and LiveCoins as possible along the way. Only one player enters the final round, where he/she experiences the actual one-on-one session against a real goalkeeper.

Set on a physical stage, a customized football launcher is paired with a large high-end LED panel behind a standard-sized goal and combined with a professional broadcasting system. A real human goalkeeper on stage awaits the digital players for the live streaming session, giving multiple gamers around the world the chance to control the ball launcher, shoot balls and score goals against the athlete – all from their mobile device.

By encouraging players to pass multiple rounds of the elimination game, one gamer then gets the chance to take full control over the launcher in the final round. Collecting goals, LivePoints and LiveCoins allows all users to compete and challenge each other to become the best player on the leaderboard. Limited time spans aka “seasons” ensure all players have equal chances to take the lead.
